abstract: Charles Isherwood reviews Joseph Stein musical Fiddler on the Roof, with music by by Jerry Bock and lyrics by Sheldon Harnick; Bartlett Sher directs and Danny Burstein stars at Broadway Theater.
lead_paragraph: This musical about a Jewish milkman honors the spirit of the 1964 original and includes scenes of beleaguered townspeople that look familiar today.

headline.main: Review: A ‘Fiddler on the Roof’ Revival With an Echo of Modernity
headline.print_headline: A Milkman Returns, Emotional as Ever

snippet: This musical about a Jewish milkman honors the spirit of the 1964 original and includes scenes of beleaguered townspeople that look familiar today.
